uvi.product_version: versions from v3.13 to before v5.4.155
uvi.description:
NFC: digital: fix possible memory leak in digital_tg_listen_mdaa()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.155 by commit 7ab488d7228a9dceb2456867f1f0919decf6efed, it was introduced in version v3.13 by commit 1c7a4c24fbfd99442cc6e14dc80fcb00f118e8b8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFC: digital: fix possible memory leak in digital_tg_listen_mdaa()
